Label: Investigation Person Last Name
Description: The last name of a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Mid Initials
Description: The middle initials of a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Email
Description: The email address of a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Phone
Description: The telephone number of a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Fax
Description: The fax number of a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Address
Description: The address of a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Affiliation
Description: The organization affiliation for a person associated with the investigation.

Label: Investigation Person Roles
Datatype: String or Ontology Annotation if accompanied by Term Accession Numbers and Term Source REFs
Description: Term to classify the role(s) performed by this person in the context of the investigation, which means that the roles reported here need not correspond to roles held withing their affiliated organization. Multiple annotations or values attached to one person can be provided by using a semicolon (";") Unicode (U0003+B) as a separator (e.g.: submitter;funder;sponsor) .The term can be free text or from, for example, a controlled vocabulary or an ontology. If the latter source is used the Term Accession Number and Term Source REF fields below are required.

Label: Investigation Person Roles Term Accession Number
Description: The accession number from the Term Source associated with the selected term.

Label: Investigation Person Roles Term Source REF
Description: Identifies the controlled vocabulary or ontology that this term comes from. The Source REF has to match one of the Term Source Names declared in the Ontology Source Reference section.
